doc.title: Daar ben ik weer
doc.plot: In 1990 in Verdun, France, Bram Vermeulen got fascinated about World War I. When he visited the trenches of Diksmuide in Belgium, he got his first perception. He knows he was a Flemish soldier, fighting against the Germans. He has vivid experiences about the life in the trenches. The Flemish soldier must have died on the battlefield. The experiences made Vermeulen believe in reincarnation. In this monologue, the Dutch performer tells of his thoughts about reincarnation and the sudden conclusion that he might not have been a Flemish soldier at all, but someone else.
